Description: Saudi Cable Co (known as: SCC) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. SCC operates within the Capital Goods sector focusing on Electrical Components and Equipment. It has Companies operating across British Islands and Middle East. SCC is based in Jeddah, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1975.
